english: None of you had the guts to face that .
chinese: 你们谁也没有勇气正视这一点。

english: This was the way to confront the thing .

chinese: 他从不敢正视自己的困难处境。

english: He must square up to the reality of being out of work .
chinese: 他必须正视失业这一现实。

english: I'll just ask you to look at these circumstances .
chinese: 我只是想提醒你正视一下这现实。
正视造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: For some reason he was unable to meet clem's eyes .
chinese: 出于某种原因他无法正视克莱姆的眼睛。

english: He should face up to the fact that he is no longer young .
chinese: 他应该勇于正视自己不再年轻这一事实。

english: And yet you dare open your mouth, and look these men in the faces .
chinese: 你还敢张口说话，敢正视这些人！

english: It takes a great deal of courage to face the situation bravely .
chinese: 大胆地正视这一局面需要很大的勇气。

english: Her eyes, so angry and direct, swept both their faces .
chinese: 她一双眼睛带着怒意正视着，把两张脸都扫了一下。

english: For a while the sisters could not look into each other's faces .
chinese: 好一阵子姐妹俩都不能互相正视对方的脸。

english: When he was finally forced to recognize this the storm broke .
chinese: 当他最后被迫正视到这一点时，风暴就大作了。

english: You've got to face it sooner or later and it might as well be tonight .
chinese: 你迟早要正视的，不妨就在今天晚上。
